F

FactsheetWebServiceClient - Class in org.fao.fi.services.factsheet.client
FactsheetWebServiceClient in order to use the REST webservices offered at http://www.fao.org/figis/ws/factsheets/

Usage Example:
FactsheetWebServiceClient c = new FactsheetWebServiceClient();
DomainList dl = c.retrieveDomainList();
FactsheetWebServiceClient() - Constructor for class org.fao.fi.services.factsheet.client.FactsheetWebServiceClient
Default constructor.
FactsheetWebServiceClient(String) - Constructor for class org.fao.fi.services.factsheet.client.FactsheetWebServiceClient
The webservice endpoint might have been moved, use this constructor to explicitly point to a certain webservice endpoint.

O

org.fao.fi.services.factsheet.client - package org.fao.fi.services.factsheet.client
To use this component, add this to your pom.xml:
<dependency>
<groupId>org.fao.figis</groupId>
<artifactId>factsheet-domain</artifactId>
<version>0.0.5</version>
</dependency>


Also include this repository in your pom.xml:
<repository>
<id>openfigis</id>
<name>openfigis-releases</name>
<url>http://78.46.99.131:8080/artifactory/libs-releases-local</url>
</repository>

P

pickNodeListWithXpath(String) - Method in class org.fao.fi.services.factsheet.client.FactsheetWebServiceClient
Given the name of an element, this operation returns whatever element including its descendants.
pickNodeWithXpath(String) - Method in class org.fao.fi.services.factsheet.client.FactsheetWebServiceClient
The xpath result given the xpath expression, factsheet, domain, and language.

R

retrieveDomainList() - Method in class org.fao.fi.services.factsheet.client.FactsheetWebServiceClient
Lists all the available domains
retrieveFactsheet(String, FactsheetDomain, FactsheetLanguage) - Method in class org.fao.fi.services.factsheet.client.FactsheetWebServiceClient
The actual factsheet URL, given the factsheet, domain and language.
retrieveFactsheetListPerDomain(FactsheetDomain) - Method in class org.fao.fi.services.factsheet.client.FactsheetWebServiceClient
List of the available languages for that factsheet, given the domain.
retrieveFactsheetListPerDomainAndLanguage(FactsheetDomain, FactsheetLanguage) - Method in class org.fao.fi.services.factsheet.client.FactsheetWebServiceClient
List of the factsheets in all languages for the given domain and language.
retrieveLanguageListInDomain4ThisFactsheet(FactsheetDomain, String) - Method in class org.fao.fi.services.factsheet.client.FactsheetWebServiceClient
List of the available languages for that factsheet, given the domain.
